original_text: Then the king of Egypt called the two women to come to him. He asked them, ‘Why have you done this? Why have you let the boys live?’
korean_text: 애굽 왕이 산파를 불러 그들에게 이르되 너희가 어찌하여 이같이 남자 아기들을 살렸느냐

sentences.original_text: Then the king of Egypt called the two women
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 이집트 왕이 두 여인을 불렀다

sentences.original_text: Why have you let the boys live?
